>
[Grippli Weapon Innovator](/Feats.aspx?ID=2823) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Grippli" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=264" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 120 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Grippli Weapon Familiarity](/Feats.aspx?ID=2818)

</column>

---

You've learned devious ways to make the most of your grippli weapons. Whenever you critically hit using a [blowgun](/Weapons.aspx?ID=66), [hatchet](/Weapons.aspx?ID=27), [scythe](/Weapons.aspx?ID=39), [shortbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=77), [composite shortbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=75), or [grippli](/Traits.aspx?ID=264) weapon, you apply the weapon's [critical specialization effect](/Rules.aspx?ID=235).
name: Grippli Weapon Innovator
